message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.OC. 

The paper proposes a stochastic gradient method for minimizing a strongly convex function represented as the average of a large number of smooth convex functions. This problem is commonly encountered in machine learning and optimization, which suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) or numerical analysis (cs.NA) sub-categories. The method also involves coordinate descent, which is a popular optimization technique in data science (cs.DS) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the complexity of the method, which is a topic of interest in operations research (cs.OC). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.AI, and cs.OC, in that order.
